long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚗 Drive Mad: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping racing experience that will have your heart racing and your adrenaline pumping! Step into the driver’s seat of powerful sports cars and compete in high-speed races across challenging tracks.

🔥 Features:

Stunning Graphics: Immerse yourself in the game with eye-catching visuals that bring the race to life.
Realistic Physics: Feel the thrill of realistic car handling as you speed through each race.
Intense Gameplay: Stay on the edge of your seat with fast-paced and heart-pounding action.
🏁 Gameplay:
Can you handle the speed and outmaneuver your opponents to become the ultimate racing champion? Test your skills with the following controls:

Accelerate: Use the “Up” arrow key or the “W” key.
Brake/Reverse: Use the “Down” arrow key or the “S” key.
Steer Left/Right: Use the arrow keys or the “A” and “D” keys.
Nitro Boost: Press the “Spacebar” or “Shift” key for a temporary speed boost.
Pause: Press the “Esc” key to pause the game and access the in-game menu.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
